eventBusSilentPublish.title: EventBus publish
eventBusSilentPublish.description: Checks the EventBus publications for missing listeners
eventBusSilentPublish.resolution: Calls to EventBus#publish should be removed or adapted such that associated listeners are found

errorLogs.title: Error logs
errorLogs.description: Checks for the amount of error logs in the console

cssCheckCustomStyles.title: CSS modifications - List of custom styles
cssCheckCustomStyles.description: Checks and report for custom CSS files/styles that overwrite standard UI5 control's CSS values
cssCheckCustomStyles.resolution: Avoid CSS manipulations with custom CSS values as this could lead to rendering issues

cssCheckCustomStylesThatAffectControls.title: CSS modifications - List of affected controls
cssCheckCustomStylesThatAffectControls.description: Checks and report all overwritten standard control's CSS values
cssCheckCustomStylesThatAffectControls.resolution: Avoid CSS manipulations with custom CSS values as this could lead to rendering issues

preloadAsyncCheck.title: Preload Configuration
preloadAsyncCheck.description: Checks whether the preload configuration was set correctly to async
preloadAsyncCheck.resolution: Add "data-sap-ui-preload="async"" to script tag that includes "sap-ui-core.js"

cacheBusterToken.title: Application Resource Caching
cacheBusterToken.description: Checks whether the application uses cache buster tokens in its requests for static resources from SAPUI5 repositories
cacheBusterToken.resolution:
Change the application
Note: Not using cache buster tokens has a negative impact on performance.
For more information, see the SAPUI5 developer guide.

resolutionurls.text: Documentation: Cache Buster for SAPUI5 Application Resources

libraryUsage.title: Library Usage
libraryUsage.description: Checks whether there are unused loaded libraries
libraryUsage.resolution: Adapt your application descriptor and your application coding to improve the performance

resolutionurls.text: Documentation: Descriptor Dependencies to Libraries and Components

lazyComponents.title: Lazy loading of components
lazyComponents.description: Checks whether lazy loading of components is used
lazyComponents.resolution: Adapt your application descriptor and your application coding to improve the performance

resolutionurls.text: Documentation: Descriptor Dependencies to Libraries and Components

reuseComponents.title: Components reusage via componentUsages
reuseComponents.description: Components are more performant and flexible, if defined via componentUsages
reuseComponents.resolution: Adapt your application descriptor and your application coding to improve the performance

modelPreloading.title: Model preloading
modelPreloading.description: Preloaded models, which load their data from external locations, can load data earlier
modelPreloading.resolution: Adapt your application descriptor and your application coding to improve the performance

asynchronousXMLViews.title: Asynchronous XML views
asynchronousXMLViews.description: Asynchronous XML views leads to smoother view transitions, doesn't block the UI and allows for more efficient SAPUI5 flexibility services
asynchronousXMLViews.resolution: Adapt your application descriptor and your application coding to improve the performance and efficiency

resolutionurls.text: Documentation: UI Adaptation at Runtime: Enable Your App

bindingPathSyntaxValidation.title: Model: Unresolved binding path
bindingPathSyntaxValidation.description: The binding path used in the model could not be resolved
bindingPathSyntaxValidation.resolution: Check the binding path for typos

resolutionurls.text: Data Binding Tutorial - Step 12: Aggregation Binding Using Templates
Data Binding Tutorial - Step 13: Element Binding

xmlViewWrongNamespace.title: XML View is not configured with namespace 'sap.ui.core.mvc'
xmlViewWrongNamespace.description: For consistency and proper resource loading, the root node of an XML view must be configured with the namespace 'mvc'
xmlViewWrongNamespace.resolution: Define the XML view as '<core:View ...>' and configure the XML namepspace as 'xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"'

xmlViewDefaultNamespace.title: Default namespace missing in XML view
xmlViewDefaultNamespace.description: If the default namespace is missing, the code is less readable and parsing performance may be slow
xmlViewDefaultNamespace.resolution: Set the namespace of the control library that holds most of the controls you use as default namespace (e.g. xmlns="sap.m")

xmlViewLowerCaseControl.title: Control tag in XML view starts with lower case
xmlViewLowerCaseControl.description: Control tags with lower case cannot be loaded in Linux-based systems
xmlViewLowerCaseControl.resolution: Start the Control tag with upper case

xmlViewUnusedNamespaces.title: Unused namespaces in XML view
xmlViewUnusedNamespaces.description: Namespaces that are declared but not used have a negative impact on performance (and may confuse readers of the code)
xmlViewUnusedNamespaces.resolution: Remove the unused namespaces from the view definition

deprecatedProperty.title: Control is using deprecated property
deprecatedProperty.description: Using deprecated properties should be avoided, because they are not maintained anymore
deprecatedProperty.resolution: Refer to the API of the element which property should be used instead.

deprecatedAggregation.title: Control is using deprecated aggregation
deprecatedAggregation.description: Using deprecated aggregation should be avoided, because they are not maintained anymore
deprecatedAggregation.resolution: Refer to the API of the element which aggregation should be used instead.

deprecatedAssociation.title: Control is using deprecated association
deprecatedAssociation.description: Using deprecated association should be avoided, because they are not maintained anymore
deprecatedAssociation.resolution: Refer to the API of the element which association should be used instead.

deprecatedEvent.title: Control is using deprecated event
deprecatedEvent.description: Using deprecated event should be avoided, because they are not maintained anymore
deprecatedEvent.resolution: Refer to the API of the element which event should be used instead.

controllerSyncCodeCheck.title: Synchronous calls in controller code
controllerSyncCodeCheck.description: Synchronous calls are deprecated within the Google Chrome browser and block the UI.

breadcrumbsInOverflowToolbar.title: Breadcrumbs in OverflowToolbar
breadcrumbsInOverflowToolbar.description: The Breadcrumbs should not be placed inside an OverflowToolbar

onlyIconButtonNeedsTooltip.title: Button: Consists of only an icon, needs a tooltip
onlyIconButtonNeedsTooltip.description: A button without text needs a tooltip, so that the user knows what the button does
onlyIconButtonNeedsTooltip.resolution: Add a value to the tooltip property of the button

checkBoxDisabledAndEditable.title: CheckBox: the control is editable, while the control is disabled
checkBoxDisabledAndEditable.resolution: Either set enabled to true ot set editable to false

densityAwareImage.title: Image: Density awareness enabled
densityAwareImage.description: One or more requests will be sent trying to get the density perfect version of the image. These extra requests will impact performance, if the corresponding density versions of the image do not exist on the server
densityAwareImage.resolution: Either ensure the corresponding density versions of the image exist on the backend server or disable density awareness

inputNeedsLabel.title: Input field: Missing label
inputNeedsLabel.description: An input field needs a label
inputNeedsLabel.resolution: Define a sap.m.Label for the input field in the xml view and set the labelFor property to this input field Id.

resolutionurls.text: SAP Fiori Design Guidelines: Input field

linkWithPressHandlerNoHref.title: Link: If a press handler is attached, the href property should not be set
linkWithPressHandlerNoHref.description: If a JavaScript action should be triggered using the press event, the href property should not be set
linkWithPressHandlerNoHref.resolution: Remove the href property of the link

panelWithheaderTextOrWithHeaderToolbarWi.title: Panel: Header text is missing
panelWithheaderTextOrWithHeaderToolbarWi.description: According to the SAP Fiori Guidelines, a panel needs a header text or a header toolbar.
panelWithheaderTextOrWithHeaderToolbarWi.resolution: Add a title directly to the panel or use a headerToolbar with title element

selectItemsSizeLimit.title: Select: Items have size limit of 100
selectItemsSizeLimit.description: The 'items' model imposes a default size limit of 100
selectItemsSizeLimit.resolution: Use the sap.ui.model.Model.prototype.setSizeLimit to adjust the size limit of the 'items' model if you expect more than 100 items

noContainInactiveItemsInSelectDialog.title: SelectDialog: Select Dialog should not contain inactive items
noContainInactiveItemsInSelectDialog.description: All items in a Select Dialog should be interactable/selectable
noContainInactiveItemsInSelectDialog.resolution: Make all items interactable/selectable or remove the inactive ones

tokenizerParentRule.title: Tokenizer: Tokenizer parent control
tokenizerParentRule.description: The tokenizer can only be used as part of MultiComboBox, MultiInput or ValueHelpDialog.
tokenizerParentRule.resolution: Do not use the Tokenizer control standalone.

formResponsiveLayout.title: Form: Use of ResponsiveLayout
formResponsiveLayout.description: ResponsiveLayout should not be used any longer because of UX requirements

formTitleAndToolbar.title: Form: Title and Toolbar at same time
formTitleAndToolbar.description: A Form or FormContainer can only have a Title or a Toolbar assigned, not both
formTitleAndToolbar.resolution: Use either Title or a Toolbar

formTitleOrAriaLabel.title: Form: Container must have a Title
formTitleOrAriaLabel.description:
A FormContainer must have some Title information.
 This can be a Title on the FormContainer or some Title assigned via AriaLabelledBy.
 If no Title is assigned to the FormContainer there must be at least a Title set on the Form or assigned via AriaLabelledBy on the Form.
formTitleOrAriaLabel.resolution: Set a Title on Form or FormContainer or assign it via AriaLabelledBy

formAllowedContent.title: Form: Content not allowed
formAllowedContent.description:
It is not allowed to use any layout as content of a Form or nest Forms This leads to issues with screen reader support, keyboard support and field alignment.
It is also not supported to use other unsupported controls as content of the Form as it is not sure this controls will meet the alingment and intartaction requirements of the Form.
formAllowedContent.resolution: Use only labels and controls implementing interface sap.ui.core.IFormContent as content of a Form

formTitleInToolbarAria.title: Form: Title in Toolbar needs to be set to AriaLabelledBy
formTitleInToolbarAria.description: If a Toolbar is used in a Form or FormContainer and the Toolbar has a Title inside it must be set to AriaLabelledBy to enable screen reader support
formTitleInToolbarAria.resolution: Set the Title used inside the Toolbar to AriaLabelledBy of the Form or FormContainer.

formPropertiesOfOtherLayout.title: SimpleForm: Properties not valid for layout
formPropertiesOfOtherLayout.description: Some properties of SimpleForm are only valid for a special layout. If they are used with a different layout they have no effect.
formPropertiesOfOtherLayout.resolution: Use only properties that are valid for the layout used

formEditableContent.title: Form: Editable content must match editable property
formEditableContent.description: The editable property of the Form is used to align the Labels and add screen reader information. If editable controls are used in Form, the property must be set, otherwise it should not be set.
formEditableContent.resolution: Set the editable property according to the content of the Form.

formWrongLayoutData.title: Form: LayoutData assigned to Form content not valid for layout
formWrongLayoutData.description: Layout data on Form content can be used to influence the appearance of Form. Depending on the layout used, different LayoutData can be used.
formWrongLayoutData.resolution: Use only valid LayoutData that are suitable for the layout used

formMissingLabel.title: Form: Label for Form content missing
formMissingLabel.description:
For accessibility reasons, each field must have a label. 
 If Label is assigned to FormElement, it will be automatically assigned to the corresponding fields. 
 But if no Label is assigned to FormElement, the application must use the ariaLabelledBy property of the field to assign a label.
formMissingLabel.resolution: Assign a label to the field

formLabelAsField.title: Form: Label is used as field
formLabelAsField.description:
FormElements can have Labels and Fields. 
 Depending on the layout used and device and screen sizes, the way labels and fields are shown might differ. 
 If labels are used as fields, this will lead to misaligned fields and labels in the Form and might have an effect on the screen reader support.
formLabelAsField.resolution: Use Labels only in the Label aggregation

objectPageComponentContainerHeight.title: ObjectPageLayout: Height of componentContainer
objectPageComponentContainerHeight.description: The componentContainer of ObjectPageLayout should always have a '100%' height explicitly set
objectPageComponentContainerHeight.resolution: Set a '100%' height to the ComponentContainer of ObjectPageLayout

resolutionurls.text: SAP Fiori Design Guidelines: Object Page

nonMultipartFileUploadRequiresXHR.title: FileUploader: To disable multipart upload you should enable XHR
nonMultipartFileUploadRequiresXHR.description: The FileUploader 'useMultipart' property is disabled, but the required 'sendXHR' property is not enabled
nonMultipartFileUploadRequiresXHR.resolution: Either enable the 'sendXHR' property of the FileUploader or set the 'useMultipart' property to true

fileUploaderParametersRequireXHRDisabled.title: FileUploader: XHR enabled but non-XHR parameter aggregation specified
fileUploaderParametersRequireXHRDisabled.description: The FileUploader XHR is enabled but parameters are specified into the non-XHR (i.e. form-based) upload 'parameters' aggregation
fileUploaderParametersRequireXHRDisabled.resolution: Either disable the 'sendXHR' property of the FileUploader, or use the 'headerParameters' aggregation to specify parameters for XHR upload

fileUploaderHeaderParametersRequireXHREn.title: FileUploader: XHR disabled but XHR parameter aggregation specified
fileUploaderHeaderParametersRequireXHREn.description: The FileUploader has specified headerParameters, but the required XHR is disabled
fileUploaderHeaderParametersRequireXHREn.resolution: Either enable the 'sendXHR' property of the FileUploader, or use the 'parameters' aggregation to specify parameters for form-based upload

testRuleTable.title: Table Test Rules
